ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:01:02 [Issue ID 4000-715141] urn:comicvine:4000-715141 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:47:34. [Issue ID 247581]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Object of Power!: On Georwell, Titan and the rebellion attempt to save Tana Mose from execution. These are just machinations of Prosecutor Zarren in order to become a member of the Council.
A Little Bit of Luck: Talisman helps a criminal escape from a bank robbery, only to have the criminal brought down by his power of Karma.
ComicInfo.Title: The Object of Power!; A Little Bit of Luck
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert M. Ingersoll,Tony Isabella,Markalan Joplin,Robert M. Ingersoll,Tony Isabella,Markalan Joplin
